note.p: Farmer. Farmed at Blankney Grange, Lincolnshire. Brother of Joseph Gilbert, tenant farmer at Claythorpe, Lincolnshire.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/2100/152/30)

England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 7 May 2020; s.v. Gilbert, William, died 29 September 1871, and Gilbert, Joseph, died 4 December 1877)
